entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider improvements to reduce allocations in validation filter logic #61222
    Backlog
  • Ensure that all ValidationAttributes are native AoT compatible #61221
    Backlog
  • Implement runtime-based `IValidatableTypeInfoResolver` implementation #61220
    Backlog
  • Respect ProblemDetailsService in default model validation filter #61219
    Backlog
  • @bind:after is not firing when used with select in Blazor #61214
  • Perf regression: httpsys-encoded-url, json, updates #61212
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, json_middleware #61211
  • Swagger in unable to produce example values for nullable properties with OpenAPI in .NET 10 #61210
  • TraceId and similar should be a fixed value when Testing with WebApplicationFactory #61207
  • Response compression not working #61205
  • Issue with AddJsonOptions when using typedresults #61202
  • Documentation for progress indicator with global InteractiveWebAssembly prerender=false is missing #61200
  • CVE-2018-8292 Explanation #61197

Closed

  • Support unified model for DataAnnotations-based validation via source generator #46349
    10.0-preview3
  • Add support for emitting ServerSentEvents from minimal APIs #56172
    10.0-preview3
  • The model is considered nonexistent even when it has been provided to the `EditForm`. #61030
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-rc.1.24409.1] No "400 - bad" ErrorResponse shows in CleanArchitecture app #57343
    10.0-preview1
  • Decouple WebApplicationFactory and TestServer #33846
    10.0-preview4
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, json, tls-renegotiation-kestrel #61158
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #61199
  • Improve automated browser testing with real server #4892
    10.0-preview4
  • Add UseKestrel() API to the WebApplicationFactory #60758
    10.0-preview4
  • SignalR.Client: Failed sending message, trying.. #61164
  • Perf regression: caching, json_middleware #61192
  • [Identity] Allow Email-Only Authentication Without Mandatory Username Field #60787
  • Converting Blazor app from full WASM to Hybrid breaks PWA offline functionality #60895
  • Only references the first list correctly - OpenAPI definition #60972

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove enableRichCodeNavigation from default-build.yml #61217
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] Upgrade to Ubuntu 22 #61216
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0] Upgrade to Ubuntu 22 #61215
    area-infrastructure, 9.0.x
  • Upgrade to Ubuntu 22 #61213
    area-infrastructure
  • [main] (deps): Update dotnet/arcade requirement to 4bb78555b1275bc6cb21f6d61f7de60b0605edc3 #61204
    area-infrastructure
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `c2ceb2b` to `52204f7` #61203
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Filename -> Identity in wixpack.zip Signing condition #61218
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview4
  • Remove richnav.yml and feed #61209
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview4
  • Fix condition for if installers are shipping #61208
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview4
  • Harden AddValidation check in validations generator #61193
    area-minimal, 10.0-preview4
  • Add a new UseKestel API to the WebApplicationFactory #60635
    area-mvc, 10.0-preview4
  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-preview.4.25174.4 #61134
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 10.0-preview4

Updated

  • Harden handling for generic type arguments in source generator #61145
    area-mvc
  • Rename MapSchemasEndoints.cs to MapSchemasEndpoints.cs #61073
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Enable static code analysis pilot in pipeline #60743
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
  • [Blazor] Generate Link headers based on StaticWebAssets manifest properties #61166
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview4
  • Make default stack size to be 1 MB in base16 #60811
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Quarantine `EnhancedNavigationScrollBehavesSameAsBrowserOnBackwardsForwardsAction` #61191
    area-blazor
  • Fixes dictionary binding error for numeric key/value #59911
    area-mvc, stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Invalid JSON value in JSON column creates exception #35863
  • SelectMany fails when projecting an entity with an owned entity into an anonymous type #35862
    Backlog
  • `AlterColumn` to make a column nullable doesn't work if `oldType` is set #35860
  • ChangeTracker disposed in DbContext #35858

Closed

  • JSON column auto-configuration #35864
  • "Exception: Library e_sqlite3 not found" with latest Microsoft.Data.Sqlite 9.0.3 on .NET Framework 4.7.2 #35859
  • new SqlConstantExpression returns NULL in EF Core 9 but EF Core 8 work corectly #35861

PullRequests

Merged

  • Remove richnav pipeline and feed #35865

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Deprecation of `ListView` in .NET 10 MAUI #28699
    .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [.NET10] Update MAUI Samples to not use TableView and to Indicate alternatives #28698
    .NET 10.0-preview4
  • Deprecation of TableView in .NET MAUI for .NET 10 #28697
    .NET 10.0-preview4
  • .NET MAUI Multi-Project sln only includes shared project when created using CLI #28695
  • [iOS 18.3.2] ImageButton no longer working with RelayCommand in ViewModel #28692
  • iOS crash randomly when navigations several times #28691
  • [iOS] ViewCell with ContextActions causes memory leaks #28689
    Backlog
  • Could not find a valid Xcode app bundle #28688
  • Not a Bug - .Net Maui compilation fails on paired mac #28686
  • TaskCanceledException on IStreamImageSource.GetStreamAsync(CancellationToken userToken) #28684
    .NET 9 SR7
  • TargetInvocationException Occurs When Selecting Header/Footer After Changing ItemsLayout in CV2 #28678
    .NET 9 SR6
  • Visibility Property Not Updating as Expected in .NET MAUI #28677
    .NET 9 SR5.1
  • Android - Dynamic Updates to CollectionView Header/Footer and Templates Are Not Displayed #28676
    .NET 9 Servicing

Closed

  • [Test] Write test for [iOS] Back-navigation with swipe-back navigates back twice - fix #28572
    .NET 9 SR7
  • [iOS] Back-navigation with swipe-back navigates back twice #28446
    .NET 9 SR5.1
  • [Android] Disposed GesturePlatformManager still be called when dispatchTouchEvent() #28564
    .NET 9 SR7
  • Image Source Handler class files are missing in .NET 9. #28687
  • The content size remains unchanged when it visibility changes at runtime #14441
  • Label not sized correctly on Android #27614
    .NET 9 SR6
  • dotnet publish command for MAUi App (.NET 9) is giving MSB1008 error - Only one folder can be specified #28498
  • Cannot create project #28437

PullRequests

Created

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Crash in runtime-async compiler #77897
    17.14
  • Go To Definition should not require tool window to decide between user code and generated code #77895
  • Rename feature in XAML within VS2022 #77894
  • Roslyn compiler hangs during TeamCity build with 'Request rejected: Failed to connect to server' error #77893
  • Support `ForInvocationWithName` in incremental source generators #77887

Closed

  • [dotnet-sdk-10.0.100-preview.3.25174.5]Failed to build QuickApp with the error 'The 'interceptors' feature is not enabled in this namespace' after retargeting to .NET 10. #77877

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/vscode] Workaround issue related to crossgen and specific .NET 9 runtimes #77904
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove richnav pipeline and package #77902
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev17.15' #77901
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove the ProjectDiagnosticAnalyzer type #77899
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Simplify the code for getting source generator diagnostics into the diagnostics service. #77898
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Make frozen doc state non-nullable #77896
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update IbcMerge version #77892
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Revert "Remove unnecessary flag in diagnostics subsystem" #77891
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Update release/vscode with changes from 2.69.25 #77903
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • Use --opt-cross-module only for assemblies within the servicing bubble #77900
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev17.15' #77884
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Clean up branches that we're excluding #77794
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • ProjectId can't be null with diagnostics #77886
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Upgrade to VSSDK.BuildTools 17.14.1043-preview2 #77580
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Generate Documentation - Add loading state #77718
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Use ConcatFast to avoid unnecessary intermediary allocation #77890
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove computed field from result type that was only used in tests #77888
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Remove dead diagnostics code #77889
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Cleanup how we compute and report file-content-load issues. #77880
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Updated

  • Add LSP handler for custom requests #77444
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Allow modification of source generated documents #77587
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Dictionary expressions: remove PROTOTYPE comments #77876
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Merge RoslynAnalyzers into Roslyn #77617
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • WIP: all diag analyzer work. #77881
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Switch to using field+auto-prop #76906
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • WIP Merge EditorFeatures.WPF into EditorFeatures #77707
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Dictionary expressions: support user-defined and dynamic conversions for expression and spread elements for dictionary target types #77860
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Update Ngen Priorities for VS #77748
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove schedule from unsupported branch #77834
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/dev17.12-telmet] Remove schedule from unsupported branch #77837
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove schedule from unsupported branch #77835
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Feedback from analyzer loading change #77780
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Detect regular method vs. operator mismatch during overriding and interface implementation #77885
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature-UserDefinedCompoundAssignmentOperators
  • Cover expression-bodied async methods with generic Task-like return values in implicit object creation analyzer #77671
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Replace ZipArchive calls of stream.Read with stream.ReadExactly or stream.ReadAtLeast #114026
    10.0.0
  • Support precompiling CCW vtables in ILC cctor interpreter (Native AOT) #114024
  • "Optimizing assemblies for size failed" - Core 9 Latest Maui iOS Build #114022
  • stack smashing detected on fedora 41 dotnet-sdk-8.0 #114021
  • [cDAC] Stackwalking support all Frame types #114019
  • Native libraries not honoring Assembly load context. #114015
  • [API Proposal]: add a flexible/polymorphic alternative of FromKeyedServicesAttribute for Controller factory #114014
  • Adopting TimeProvider in MemoryCache #114011
  • [Mono] Interop issue with structs containing reference type fields between C# and C++ #114007
  • System.Net.Security.Tests timing out in the CI #114004
  • Running `dotnet test` in first tab of the command line program is slower than running in the first tab #114000
  • JIT: Switch should create assertions #113992
    Future

Closed

  • net8.0-android->net9-android linker error on publish #111338
  • Outbox S.S.Cryptography.PbeParameters #113952
    10.0.0
  • DataContractSerializerTests.DCS_MyPersonSurrogate_Stress failing in CI #35066
  • [cDAC] Implement `ClrDataAccess::GetFrameName` #112274
    10.0.0
  • Build failing on tip : "./build.sh --subsetCategory CoreCLR -c Release -arch x64" #34649
    Future
  • Handle KilledRegisters more efficiently in LinearScan::processKills() #112962
    10.0.0
  • 'System.Net.*' END OF WORK ITEM LOG: Command timed out, and was killed #114013
  • [dotnet-sdk-10.0.100-preview.3.25174.5] IAsyncGrouping<,> missing from System.Linq.AsyncEnumerable.dll #114006
  • how to analyze the mpld file #113960
    10.0.0
  • Queryable.{Max,Min}By overloads accept an IComparer<TSource> instead of IComparer<TKey> #113878
    10.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Bug: Array.CreateInstance method not working as expected #113750
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix crossgen2 sometimes emitting tokens from the wrong module into R2R output #114029
    NO-MERGE, area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Annotate System.ServiceModel.Syndication for trimming and AOT #114028
    area-System.ServiceModel.Syndication, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Sign and harden pkgs #114027
    needs-area-label
  • Fix ZipArchive loop condition for reading central directory headers #114023
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [mono] Run static class constructor before pinvoke resolution #114020
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • remove the switch to fallback to old EH #114018
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Rename rapidjson helper functions #114017
    area-Host
  • JIT: Propagate flow into finally regions correctly in synthesis #114016
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix Unable to load shared library 'jitinterface_x64' build error on linux/mac #114012
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [Mono]: Fix syslog format error on Windows. #114009
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Don't use `Delegate.Method` in ServiceDescriptor #114008
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [RISC-V] Partial unfolding of the loop generated in genZeroInitFrameUsingBlockInit and simplification of jump encoding #114003
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Remove List<T> allocation in Task.WhenAll for empty sequences #114002
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Utilize `sh(x)add(.uw)` instructions #113999
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Enable more constant foldings for switch ops using assertions #113998
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use PME identity for DAC signing #113997
    needs-area-label
  • [mono] [hotreload] Adjust row_size and size_bitfield from the baseline based on the delta sizes #113995
    area-EnC-mono
  • JIT: Fix improperly contained BroadcastScalarToVector(CreateScalar(GT_LONG)) #113994
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Remove unused OutputPgoPathForCI target from nativepgo.targets #114025
    area-Infrastructure
  • Outbox PbeParameters and PbeEncryptionAlgorithm #113987
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0
  • Fix trivial typo #113130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Only use PGO data if clang can read it #114005
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, PGO
  • Add some basic tests for SLH-DSA #113766
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/8.0-staging] Send connection WINDOW_UPDATE before RTT PING #113702
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.x
  • Fix declared type of custom comparer for MaxBy and MinBy #113944
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Linq, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Add some logging for the new EH #113891
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • [WinHTTP] Remove legacy (Win 8.1-) WinInet proxy handling #113915
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Do not generate unconstructed EEType for arrays that have a template #113951
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use the shipping version in PackageOverrides.txt #113981
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Fix tracing in host sdk_resolver.cpp #113887
    area-Host

Updated

  • [RuntimeAsync] Move runtime async to the main repo #113976
    new-api-needs-documentation, runtime-coreclr, runtime-async
  • Share implementation of ComWrappers between CoreCLR and NativeAOT #113907
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Extract `UnsafeAccessorAttribute` generation code. #113989
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Avoid all compiler optimization on embedded apphost hash #110554
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Use ArrayPool in CSTRMarshaler.ConvertToNative #113991
    tenet-performance, area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Stackwalk support for interpreted frames #113900
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Optimize loading 64 bit constant with new algorithm implementation and using `emitDataConst` #113250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [mono][interp] Check packedsimd first on browser #113743
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Allow TargetOS and TargetRid to be overridden in DotNetBuild.props #113765
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Accelerate long -> floating casts on x86 #113930
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] event pipe - JavaScript part #110818
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Include in WaitingWriteCount the thread that may be waiting in upgradable mode #113982
    area-System.Threading
  • Increase `runtime-coreclr libraries-pgo` timeout #113942
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Make COR_PRF_DISABLE_OPTIMIZATIONS Allowable After Attach and non immutable #113924
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [cDAC] Adds DAC like entrypoint with new COM interface #113899
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • missing opportunities in constant folding around bitwise ops #99136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Revamp the generation of runtime division checks on ARM64 #111543
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Optimize casts from constant byrefs #99130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Give more detail on RyuJIT porting #108080
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • WIP #113835
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix EH and stack walking on linux-x86 #113972
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix Hang on when GetRequestStreamAsync #113409
    area-System.Net
  • JIT: Remove `BBF_FUNCLET_BEG` #113975
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Add post-morph profile repair phase #113896
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [CI run only] Use funclets and new EH on win-x86 #113576

  • Block inlines with different exception wrapping behavior #113849
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't expose TrustedCertificatesDirectory() and StartNewTlsSessionContext() to NetFx #113963

  • TypeMap API (Dynamic implementation) #113954
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Use managed signer for bundles #110417
    area-HostModel

  • Enable CoreCLR/tvOS build #111804

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-28
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • [Swift Bindings] Emitter redesign proposal #3059
    area-SwiftBindings

Updated

  • [Swift Bindings] Implement Swift native handle as `SafeHandle` #3052
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [Shipping] Publish StoreKit bindings as NuGet packages and run device tests #3040

  • [Swift projection tooling] New logging mechanism using Microsoft.Extensions.Logging API #3058

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Validate package IDs specified via the #:package directive #47991
  • Align #:package syntax with CLI for specifying package ID and version #47990
  • dotnet nuget why doesn't spot existence of dependency #47982
  • Support package@version syntax in `dotnet package add` #47981
  • Expand/standardize usage of package@version syntax across the .NET CLI #47980

Closed

  • Prevent Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Internal.Assets from being restored when not needed #46165
  • Bug fix rsn #47962
  • No templates list when execute the dotnet new list command #47928

PullRequests

Created

  • dotnet CLI: "Use primary constructor" #47998
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Sign and harden pkgs #47996
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet CLI: More cleanup via VS tools #47995
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • skip making archives for inner loop #47993
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make version identification slightly better #47987
    untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #47986
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve MTP dotnet test exit code messages #47979
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use Roslyn to parse directives in file-based programs #47978
    untriaged, Area-run-file
  • Use TargetArchitecture and TargetRid properties #47977
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • allow @ syntax for package versions in package add #47961
    untriaged, Area-CLI

Merged

  • Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 10.0.100-preview.4.25178.1 #47988
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove SB test exception for Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Internal.Assets package #47984
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid crash when no profile contains 'Project' command #47953
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Shorten path to IntermediateSdkInstallerOutputPath #47983
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #47976
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improves workaround for MacOS file watching quirks #47926
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Remove summary when failing, and double space #47872
    Area-dotnet test, untriaged
  • Add Third Party Notices Template to Source Mappings #47058
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #47944
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove EnableDefenderForLinux 1ES PT feature flag #47959
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve pruned package data loading and handling #46898
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • `dotnet package list` command should restore first #47873
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move in-vertical manifest merging to new arcade package #47881
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [SBRP Usage Report] Add target pack support and scan project.assets.json files for package downloads #47916
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Make all the properties in StaticWebAssetEndpoint lazy #47833
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Use Arcade's publishing logic to publish a given VMR vertical #47076
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • Make it possible to prep other RIDs and architectures #47956
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove unnecessary CA2022 suppressions #47904
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Simplify exit code logic for dotnet test (MTP) and consider no results correctly as "zero tests ran" #47874
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [ApiDiff] Implementation of the new ApiDiff that reuses GenAPI features #46425
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fixes #44839 to unblock runtime when changes TFMs #47960
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Include only PackageReferences included at runtime in deps.json #46218
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Move generating implicit framework defines to a target. #45696
    Area-NetSDK
